sentences.en: a wholly satisfactory solution
sentences.cn: 完全令人满意的解决办法

sentences.en: For urban areas this approach was wholly inadequate.
sentences.cn: 对于市区来说，这种办法根本不会奏效。

sentences.en: He is wholly concerned with his own grandeur.
sentences.cn: 他只关心自己的显赫地位。

sentences.en: He reaffirmed that he was wholly responsible for the confusion.
sentences.cn: 他再次表明对此混乱情况他负有全部责任。

sentences.en: Her advice has frequently been less than wholly helpful.
sentences.cn: 她的建议往往毫无帮助。

sentences.en: His mind was wholly taken up with the question.
sentences.cn: 他满脑子都在想这个问题。

sentences.en: His story is wholly fictitious.
sentences.cn: 他的故事全是编造的.

sentences.en: I am wholly incredulous of the truth of his story.
sentences.cn: 我根本不相信他说的是真话.

sentences.en: I wholly agree with you.
sentences.cn: 我完全同意你.

sentences.en: In my opinion, the decision was wholly justified.
sentences.cn: 我认为，这个决定完全合理。

sentences.en: None of us can be absolved wholly of wrong doing.
sentences.cn: 我们当中没有一个人的罪行能完全获得赦免。

sentences.en: Our Intelligence Service was untrained, cumbersome, and almost wholly ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 我们的情报部门人员缺乏训练，机构臃肿，简直毫无用处。

sentences.en: Scientific knowledge aims at being wholly impersonal.
sentences.cn: 科学知识要求完全不受个人感情的影响。

sentences.en: She had acted in ways that he found wholly admirable.
sentences.cn: 他对她的行事方式佩服得五体投地.

sentences.en: The company is a wholly-owned subsidiary of a large multinational.
sentences.cn: 这是一家大型跨国企业的全资子公司。

sentences.en: The criticism was wholly unjustified.
sentences.cn: 这样的批评完全是不公平的。

sentences.en: The Locomotive Construction Company Ltd is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Trust.
sentences.cn: 机车建筑有限公司是该托拉斯的全资子公司。

sentences.en: The report claimed that the disaster was wholly unavoidable.
sentences.cn: 报告称这场灾难完全无法避免。

sentences.en: They contract work out wholly.
sentences.cn: 他们把工作全部包了出去。

sentences.en: Your idea isn't wholly practical.
sentences.cn: 你的想法并非完全现实.

words.tran_cn: 健全的；有益健康的；合乎卫生的；审慎的
卫生地；有益健康地；审慎地；安全地

phrases.tran_cn: 全资子公司；全资附属机构；全资拥有子公司
